input_descriptions.main_goal: A string representing the main goal of the task.
input_descriptions.sub_goal: A string representing the sub-goal of the task.
input_descriptions.specific_info: An optional string containing specific information to be considered during information retrieval.

output_descriptions.status: A string indicating the success ('success') or failure ('error') of the information retrieval operation.
output_descriptions.retrieved_information: A string containing the retrieved information based on the given input.
